sql: SELECT aya_index, GROUP_CONCAT('' || sub_subject || case when readingresult is not null then ' = ' || readingresult else '' end|| ' : ' || CASE WHEN q6 IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE CASE WHEN r6_1 IS NOT NULL THEN 'خلف ' ELSE 'خلاد ' END END || REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(reading, 'قرأ ', ''), 'قرؤوا ', ''), 'بلا خلاف عنه', ''), 'حرفا مديا من جنس حركة ما قبلها', '')) AS text FROM quran_data WHERE qareesrest LIKE '%حمزة%' AND IFNULL(r5_2, 0) = 0 AND IFNULL(tags, '') NOT LIKE '%basmala%' GROUP BY aya_index ORDER BY aya_index;

SELECT aya_index, GROUP_CONCAT('' || sub_subject || case when readingresult is not null then ' = ' || readingresult else '' end|| ' : ' || REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(reading, 'قرأ ', ''), 'قرؤوا ', ''), 'بلا خلاف عنه', ''), 'حرفا مديا من جنس حركة ما قبلها', '')) AS text FROM quran_data WHERE R1_2 IS NOT NULL AND IFNULL(r5_2, 0) = 0 AND IFNULL(tags, '') NOT LIKE '%basmala%' GROUP BY aya_index ORDER BY aya_index;

SELECT aya_index, GROUP_CONCAT('' || sub_subject || case when readingresult is not null then ' = ' || readingresult else '' end || ' : ' || REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(reading, 'قرأ ', ''), 'قرؤوا ', ''), 'بلا خلاف عنه', ''), 'حرفا مديا من جنس حركة ما قبلها', '')) AS text FROM ALL_qeraat WHERE R1_1 IS NOT NULL AND IFNULL(r5_2, 0) = 0 AND IFNULL(tags, '') NOT LIKE '%basmala%' AND reading not like 'قرأ بصلة ميم الجمع وصل%' GROUP BY aya_index ORDER BY aya_index;

SELECT aya_index, GROUP_CONCAT('' || sub_subject || case when readingresult is not null then ' = ' || readingresult else '' end|| ' : ' || CASE WHEN q2 IS NOT NULL THEN ' ' ELSE CASE WHEN r2_1 IS NOT NULL THEN 'البزي ' ELSE 'قنبل ' END END || REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(reading, 'قرأ ', ''), 'قرؤوا ', ''), 'بلا خلاف عنه', ''), 'حرفا مديا من جنس حركة ما قبلها', ''),'خلافا لجمهور القراء','')) AS text FROM quran_data WHERE (R2_1 IS NOT NULL or R2_2 IS NOT NULL) AND IFNULL(r5_2, 0) = 0 AND reading <> 'قرأ بصلة ميم الجمع وصلا.' and IFNULL(tags, '') NOT LIKE '%basmala%' GROUP BY aya_index ORDER BY aya_index;
